full_summary:
=====================================

### Tender Notice: EZ899-250158

#### Title

EZ899-250158 – Phase 1 – Kent Institution Principal Entrance Replacement

#### Reference Number

WS4618018928-Doc4618070782

#### Solicitation Number

WS4618018928

#### Publication and Closing Dates

*   **Publication Date**: June 4, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: June 26, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time

#### Contract Details

*   **UNSPSC Classification**: 72121400 - Specialized public building construction services
*   **Procurement Category**: CNST
*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Proposal Evaluation

The procurement follows a two-phase evaluation process:

*   **Phase 1**: Evaluation of bidder qualifications
*   **Phase 2**: Financial bid evaluation based on specifications and drawings

#### Tender Status

*   **Current Status**: Cancelled

#### Trade Agreements

The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Janie Leung

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

Email: [janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

The tender notice and related documents are available online at:
